snippet.title: Old School Gaming - Gameplay Footage #1 - Pooyan (Famicom/NES)
snippet.description:
#Pooyan is an old #FAMICOM / #NES game. Enjoy!

Subscribe! http://bit.ly/1IBBVZV

I cover every level but the 2nd bonus game.
Yep! I got owned, but you have to admit it gets ridiculously hard.
*THIS IS NOT MY BEST PLAYTHROUGH*

AVAILABLE FOR THE WII'S VIRTUAL CONSOLE (JAPAN ONLY)
"Pooyan was also included on a compilation disc, Konami Arcade Classics, for the Playstation 1." "Mark Kinter of Virginia, USA, scored a world record 1,609,250 points on the arcade version of Pooyan on December 16, 1983." ~ from Wikipedia.org

*(07/29/10) LOL 500+ views. Thanks!*
*(10/22/10) Wow! 1K+ views.*
*(12/07/15) Thanks for 19K views!*
*(01/21/22) 29K views? Why are you still here?*
